name: STRIVE (itch) (Frostnoble)
description:
You awake to the sound of waves crashing on the salty shore.  As you rise, you find yourself in an unfamiliar place. Can you survive and thrive while being trapped on a deserted island?

This is the Demo for STRIVE,  so some aspects of the game may change for the Full Version.
Since this is a Demo, there is no final goal to work towards and the game only lasts for 5 days. So just see how far you can get within those few precious days.

Features:
  • A simple to understand Crafting System
  • Resource Management
  • Hunting and Farming
  • An authentic retro Gameboy Color experience 
  • A weather system that affects survivability
  • Hunger and Thirst management
  • A musical conch : )
Gameplay

If your Hunger (H) or your Water (W) reach 0, you will lose Health (♡). 
If your Fatigue (F) reaches 100, you will also lose Health (♡). 
If your Health (♡) reaches 0, you lose, gameover.

Keyboard Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys — Move
  • Z / J — Interact 
  • X / K — Menu / Use
  • BACKSPACE — Drop Current Item
  • SPACE — Open Inventory
